description:
Dealing with unsightly data in the real world

Presented by Alexander Dutton

Drawing on experiences writing http://m.ox.ac.uk/, we'll explore the art
of getting data out of unhelpful systems. We'll start with working out
how to interact with a system, move on to techniques for parsing the
data it gives you, and round off by implementing a shinier interface
over the top.
title: Dealing with unsightly data in the real world. (#156)
